add_speech_bubble.sql: INSERT INTO speech_bubbles (conversation_id, content, role, name, metadata, function_call) SELECT id, :content, :role, CASE WHEN :name IS NOT NULL THEN :name END, CASE WHEN :metadata IS NOT NULL THEN :metadata END, CASE WHEN :function_call IS NOT NULL THEN :function_call END FROM conversations WHERE uuid = :uuid

get_conversation_by_uuid.sql: SELECT content, role, name, metadata, function_call FROM (SELECT content, role, name, metadata, function_call, created_at FROM speech_bubbles WHERE conversation_id = (SELECT id FROM conversations WHERE uuid = :uuid) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20) ORDER BY created_at ASC

search_in_conversation.sql: SELECT content, role, name, metadata, function_call, created_at FROM speech_bubbles WHERE conversation_id = (SELECT id FROM conversations WHERE uuid = :uuid) AND content LIKE '%' || :queryTags || '%' ORDER BY created_at DESC

get_all_conversations.sql: SELECT uuid FROM conversations WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT conversation_id FROM speech_bubbles)

get_tasks_with_metadata.sql: SELECT queueID, taskData, status, result, systemMessage, metadata, created_at FROM tasks ORDER BY created_at DESC
get_tasks_with_metadata.title: Get Tasks

get_tasks.sql: SELECT queueID, taskData, status, result, systemMessage, created_at FROM tasks ORDER BY created_at DESC
get_tasks.title: Get Tasks

get_tasks_by_queueID.sql: SELECT queueID, taskData, status, result, systemMessage, metadata, created_at FROM tasks WHERE queueID = :queueID
get_tasks_by_queueID.title: Get Tasks by queueID

add_task_with_metadata.sql: INSERT INTO tasks (queueID, taskData, status, result, systemMessage, metadata) VALUES (:queueID, :taskData, :status, :result, :systemMessage, :metadata)

add_task.sql: INSERT INTO tasks (queueID, taskData, status, result, systemMessage) VALUES (:queueID, :taskData, :status, :result, :systemMessage)

update_task.sql: UPDATE tasks SET status = :status, result = :result, systemMessage = :systemMessage, metadata = :metadata WHERE queueID = :queueID

get_messages.sql: SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY created_at DESC
get_messages.title: Get Messages

get_messages_with_limit.sql: SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT :limit
get_messages_with_limit.title: Get Messages with Limit

get_memories.sql: SELECT substr(message, 1, 100) || CASE WHEN length(message) > 100 THEN '...' ELSE '' END as message, uuid FROM messages ORDER BY created_at DESC
get_memories.title: Get Memories

get_memories_with_limit.sql: SELECT substr(message, 1, 100) || CASE WHEN length(message) > 100 THEN '...' ELSE '' END as message, uuid FROM messages ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT :limit
get_memories_with_limit.title: Get Memories with Limit

delete_memory.sql: DELETE FROM messages WHERE uuid IN (:uuid)
